name: Cockwork Industries Complete
description:
Cockwork Industries Complete is an erotic adventure game where you play as Dwayne, winner of the Willy Wanker's Golden Ticket, invited to attend the mysterious event that's about to take place in the infamous science facility - Cockwork Industries.
Learn the mysteries of Cockwork Industries and romance its steaming-hot employees in this thrilling tale of sex, science, deception and panda plushies!Features:
A fully-fledged adventure game with 2-3h of gameplay for a single playthrough.
Full-HD (1080p) graphics with fully animated dialogue sequences and sex scenes.
Multiple playthrough paths leading to different romance outcomes and endings.
Interactive sex scenes and minigames.
7 romance options + 1 optional gay romance option.
8 rich and interactive locations.
Unlockable in-game rewards (intentionally separated from Steam achievements in order to provide user discretion).Love Interests:
Andrea - fiery red-headed secretary with a secret agenda.
Elena - kinky latina botanist with an unusual pet.
Kyoko - dedicated receptionist on industrial spy's trail.
Lucy - manager of Cockwork Industries Site B with a penchant for dominance.
Maia - young and hopeful barista looking for true love.
Nadia - ambitious and unfulfilled journalist desperate to get her hands on a good story.
Rita - scientific genius with a wild nature.
Diego - rookie mechanic looking for male company.
